name: OTP_DISPLAY_NAME_HX
description: This table contains columns for the Display Name - History (I OTP 81000) and Display Name Instant - History (I OTP 81001) items.

columns.name: OTP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient order template record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: UPDATE_INSTANT_DTTM_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant that the corresponding display name history line applies to.

columns.name: OTP_DISPLAY_NAME_HX
columns.description: Stores the history of the order display name.
